column4: Can someone tell me where do i find an answer of why my ubuntu could not shut down? it only works manual as in button :)
Can someone tell me where do i find an answer of why my ubuntu could not shut down? it only works manual as in button :)
thank you very much but what file in syslog more exactly?
i'm a beginner user don't know exactly what to look for and some things from the log sounds chinese yet to me.
im sorry what problem were you trying to fix again?
well i wanted to turn off my laptop because i had to go to work and it would't turn of...the ubuntu logo white was staying on my black screen
and i want to know why it failed to shut down and how to fix it...so in the future i will not have this problem again
shure i will be right back with an answer
and i have a tray icon i have never seen before says something like session active not inhibited screen idle..if you see this text your display server is broken
its probably whats blocking the shutdown/hibernate process
